author: Staff Reporter
text:
Robbers decamp with gold, cash

More than 50 sovereigns of gold jewellery and cash have been stolen from a house in MGR Nagar 9th Street, Kodungaiyur.

Dharmaraj, who owns a retail shop, had gone with his family to Salem for a function on February 2. When he returned on Thursday, the front door of the house was found broken open.

The steel almirah had been broken open too and gold jewellery weighing 55 sovereigns and Rs. 19,000 in cash were stolen.

He filed a case with the MKB Nagar police, who brought experts and lifted fingerprints from the site of the crime.

A police official said the intruders would have scaled the wall of the nearby house. — Staff Reporter
title: Robbers decamp with gold, cash from house
